data.headline: DevOps Engineer
data.summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a background in software development and a strong interest in cloud infrastructure and automation. Skilled in deploying and managing containerized applications, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and optimizing system performance and reliability.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented containerized application deployments using Docker and Kubernetes
Automated infrastructure provisioning and configuration management using Terraform and Ansible
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins to ensure reliable and efficient software delivery
Monitored and optimized cloud infrastructure performance using monitoring tools and custom dashboards
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve production issues and improve system reliability
Provided technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members

experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained web applications using Python, Django, and React
Participated in the design and implementation of RESTful APIs
Collaborated with product managers and designers to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software
Contributed to the improvement of development processes and best practices

experience.title: IT Support Technician
bullets: Provided technical support and troubleshooting for end-users
Maintained and updated company IT infrastructure and systems
Documented and implemented IT policies and procedures

projects.name: Cloud-native Application Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable, highly available, and secure cloud-native application platform using Kubernetes, Istio, and other open-source tools.

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
projects.description: Developed and automated a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, Ansible, and Terraform to streamline the software delivery process for multiple applications.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Javier is a mid-career DevOps Engineer with a friendly, approachable expression.
